title.rendered: How to Build a Meaningful Personal Brand as a Startup Founder

content.rendered:
FROM HUFFINGTON POST: For three years, building my own brand was dead-last on the priority list. I promised I’d get around to eventually—but first, I had a product to build, capital to raise, a team to grow, and a community to nurture. And wasn’t all this personal brand stuff just a popularity contest anyway?

Don’t make the same mistake. As startup founders, we need all the help we can get: We’ll need to persuade investors and inspire our team. We’ll need to delight users and move journalists. This is where your personal brand comes in, allowing you to reach like-minded people across the world and bring them together, in one place. Brand building, after all, is just relationship building at scale. Continued….

jetpack-related-posts.title: ¿Qué es Crehana?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Conoce Crehana, una startup acelerada por Wayra, que busca revolucionar la educación. Hoy, profesionales consumen mucho tiempo enfocándose a actividades laborales y de empresa dejando de lado la necesidad de educación continua. Existen webs que intentan resolver este problema ofreciendo cursos online. Sin embargo, mantienen estructuras rígidas que no se adaptan a…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Career Change: A Fresh Take On Finding Your Passion

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Making a living while doing something we're passionate about gives us a kind of personal freedom that most people crave.
